description: Try our easy to follow Melting Moments recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Biscuit,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Mother's Day,Father's Day,Soy free,Vegetarian,Easter,Peanut free
name: Melting Moments Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.5 cup icing sugar, sifted (save 1 cup for buttercream filling)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 160Â°C. Line three large baking trays with baking paper.
Beat butter and vanilla together in a bowl until pale and creamy. Sift flour, icing sugar, custard powder and a pinch of salt together. Stir into butter mixture to form a soft dough.

Roll tablespoons of mixture into 30 balls and place on trays, leaving space between for spreading. Using a fork, press biscuits slightly to leave indents. Bake for 20 minutes or until pale golden. Cool on trays for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.
Meanwhile, to make the buttercream, beat butter in a bowl until creamy. Gradually add the icing sugar, beating until smooth.
Spread flat side of half of the biscuits with buttercream. Top with 1 tsp jam and sandwich together with a second biscuit. Repeat with remaining biscuits.
